text:
With the v1.5 ant RPM, the junit-3.7.jar file is picked up in ANT_HOME/lib.
After upgrading RPMs from 1.5 to 1.5.1, junit can no longer be found.

ant.conf indicates that ANT_HOME is /usr. The file /usr/lib/junit-3.7.jar exists.

For some reason external classpath behavior has changed between v1.5 and v1.5.1.
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
1) Apache ant does not release rpms
2) the junit-*.jar file is not is the release
we no longer provide RPMs, so it is time to close the component as it only causes confusion.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
